title: Four Shot Overnight in Wilmington
content:
Four people were shot and wounded early Monday in Wilmington, police said.
The shooting was reported at 12:40 a.m. at 1067 McDonald Ave., said Sgt. G. Pinel of the Los Angeles Police Department's Harbor Station.
Two of the victims were men and two were women, he said. They were taken to hospitals, where three of the victims had stable vital signs and one was in surgery, Pinel said.
There was no suspect information.
"Most if not everyone (victims) are uncooperative," Pimel said.
